issues.description: The Farm classâ€™s animals attribute is declared public in the solution, but the UML and problem description specify it as a private field with accompanying getter and setter. This visibility mismatch contradicts the encapsulation requirement and the student instructions to implement a private List<Animal> animals.
issues.suggested_fix: Change the animals field in Farm.java to private List<Animal> animals; so that it matches the UML spec, and keep the public getter and setter for access.
